name: Escape Paint's Mansion
description:
A downloadable point-and-click game for desktop.

Music "Ouverture" by Spring, a talented artist and composer:
Spring: https://opengameart.org/users/spring
"Ouverture": https://opengameart.org/content/ouverture

The game was created using LibGDX, a free high-quality java game framework:
https://libgdx.badlogicgames.com/

Don't forget to check for updates!
